channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: All of Lincoln Mews - Outside Brent Garages & Electricity Substation, 30th August
item.description:
Lincoln mews never has a street cleaner Outside pub bins on the street is loose rubbish and broken glass Parking bays on Lincoln mews has rubbish and vegetation Outside brent garages is a huge amount of litter and loose vegetation

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Willesden Lane, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Box with building materials inside, metal box and broken chair, 30th August
item.description:
